text: Javier Astúa Araya (6 November 1968 – 4 January 2022) was a Costa Rican professional footballer. He played as a forward. He played for the Costa Rica national football team between 1992 until 1994, making thirteen appearances. Astúa died on 4 January 2022 from heart disease in San José, Costa Rica, at the age of 53.Fallece recordado exjugador del fútbol nacional: Javier Astúa Araya ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from heart disease Category:Costa Rican footballers
title: Javier Astúa
